title: Plague Doctor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Medicate. Heal them. 1 uses.
- At night, choose a player to experiment on. They gain 2 stress, and you gain 3 uses of Medicate.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may Medicate any number of people per night.

desc:
Post 5327
*Indiscriminate science stains the surgeon's hands.*
